snippet: A judge granted a protection order on Monday against Lt. Gov. Lavon Heidemann after his sister accused him of violence.
abstract: Protection order is issued against Nebraska Lt Gov Lavon Heidemann after his sister Lois Bohling accused him of violence.
lead_paragraph: A judge granted a protection order on Monday against Lt. Gov. Lavon Heidemann after his sister accused him of violence.

headline.main: Nebraska: Protection Order Issued Against Official
headline.print_headline: Nebraska: Protection Order Issued Against Official
